plot: A Czech father writes a letter to the son he will never see, explaining his resistance to the Nazi invasion of Czechoslovakia.
title: To My Unborn Son
plot_es: A Czech father writes a letter to the son he will never see, explaining his resistance to the Nazi invasion of Czechoslovakia.
plot_en: A Czech father writes a letter to the son he will never see, explaining his resistance to the Nazi invasion of Czechoslovakia.
